name: L2BEAT
question_1:
L2BEAT is a community-run website dedicated to providing research and statistics about different layer 2 implementations on Ethereum.
It's a great educational resource that increases transparency of the L2 ecosystem.
Thanks to the information provided by L2BEAT users can learn about different risks and tradeoffs of various L2 solutions.
It empowers users with tools to make a well-informed decision on which L2 scaling solution they want to use.
